citation.case_name: Hillside Dairy Inc. v. Lyons, Secretary, California Department of Food and Agriculture and Ponderosa Dairy v. Lyons, Secretary, California Department of Food and Agriculture

html:
535 U.S. 985

HILLSIDE DAIRY INC. ET AL.
v.
LYONS, SECRETARY, CALIFORNIA DEPARTMENT OF FOOD AND AGRICULTURE, ET AL. and
PONDEROSA DAIRY ET AL.
v.
LYONS, SECRETARY, CALIFORNIA DEPARTMENT OF FOOD AND AGRICULTURE, ET AL.

No. 01-950.

No. 01-1018.

Supreme Court of the United States.

April 15, 2002.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in these cases expressing the views of the United States.
